biotools.summary:
a web application to explore SNP-associations and annotate SNP-sets.

snpXplorer is an online open source web-server to explore associations from Genome-Wide Association Studies (GWAS).
 snpXplorer offers a wide range of possibilities, including overlap of multiple studies. Please see the documentation in this repository to get more information about how to run snpXplorer and its options.
